scripts.migrate-dev: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- ts-node database/MigrationsExecutor.ts && npm run generate-types-dev
scripts.migrate-prod: dotenvx run -f .env.production -- ts-node database/MigrationsExecutor.ts && npm run generate-types-prod
scripts.remigrate-dev: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- ts-node database/MigrationsExecutor.ts -remigrate && npm run generate-types-dev
scripts.force-remigrate-prod: dotenvx run -f .env.production -- ts-node database/MigrationsExecutor.ts -remigrate && npm run generate-types-prod
